name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Christopher COWAN, Appellant
docket_number: Appeal No. 42 Eastern District Appeal Docket 1994

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Christopher COWAN, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Joseph M. Fioravanti, Media, for C. Cowan.
Vram Nedurian, Jr., Newtown Square, and Dennis C. McAndrews, Media, for the Com.
casebody.head_matter:
652 A.2d 307
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Christopher COWAN, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 20, 1994.
Decided Jan. 11, 1995.
Joseph M. Fioravanti, Media, for C. Cowan.
